questions.text: Where did Cliff go on vacation?
questions.explanation:
Florida.

	Cliff drove everyone crazy because all he talked about when he got back was Florida. It got to the point where no one wanted to speak to him for fear he would start in again about his trip.

2 weeks.

	Norm said to him, "I missed you these last couple of days." and Cliff responded that it was two weeks. Norm apparently didn't miss him the entire time, or it seemed like a shorter time than it actually was.

Sam.

	Sam was an alcoholic. When an alcoholic falls off the wagon it means they have started to drink again after they have gotten sober.

questions.text: What did Diane have trouble saying?
questions.explanation:
Sam's name.

	In season 2, Sam and Diane had broken up. Diane went away to get her mental health taken care of.

questions.text: What did Sam find to be so funny?
questions.correct: That Diane had a mental breakdown
options: That Diane was back at Cheers
That Diane was still in love with him
That Diane had a new boyfriend
questions.explanation:
That Diane had a mental breakdown.

	Diane did have a boyfriend but Sam didn't know that until much later. He said he had women get depressed because of him but none that went.... and then he made a funny noise meaning she went nuts.

Kelsey Grammer & Kelsey Grammar.

	Kelsey Grammer was born February 21, 1955 in the Virgin Islands. Between "Cheers" and "Frasier", he played the role of Frasier Crane for 20 years.

questions.text: What did Frasier say there is no such thing as in his profession?
questions.explanation:
a closed door.

	Frasier was a psychiatrist. His favorite psychiatrist was Sigmund Freud.

Frasier.

	Fraiser and Diane met while Diane was getting help for her mental issues. Frasier worked at the facility but was not her psychiatrist.

questions.text: What was Sam's response to who Diane was dating?
questions.explanation:
"Eeew".

	Later on when the rest of the bar found out, they all respond with "Eew" as well. Diane asks them, "What do you mean 'eew'?".

options: She decided on her own to stay
questions.explanation:
Coach.

	Coach told Diane that if she left Sam would go back to drinking. He told Sam that if Diane left she'd be back in the "nuthouse". He told Frasier that if Diane left, she and Sam would always have feelings for each other.
